casebody.data:
NEIDLINGER v. STOKES. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. January 24, 1908.) Action by George H. Neidlinger against William E. D. Stokes. Judgment for plaintiff. Erom an order denying a new trial, defendant appeals. Affirmed.

Argued before JENKS, HOOKER, RICH, MILLER, and GAYNOR, JJ.

Abraham Gruber, for appellant. Frank Harvey Field, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, with costs, on the authority of Neidlinger v. Onward Construction Company (decided herewith) 109 N. Y. Supp. 717.
